titles.title: Lake Tahoe Restoration Reauthorization Act
A bill to reauthorize the Lake Tahoe Restoration Act, and for other purposes.
Lake Tahoe Restoration Reauthorization Act
Lake Tahoe Restoration Reauthorization Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Public Lands, Forests, and Mining. Hearings held.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Manchin without amendment. With written report No. 117-85.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 286.

bill.summary:
Lake Tahoe Restoration Reauthorization Act
This bill reauthorizes through September 30, 2034, activities to restore Lake Tahoe and its surrounding basin. Lake Tahoe is a large freshwater lake on the border of California and Nevada.
